GETUS Communications Ltd also known as "GETUS Communications" or "GETUS" is an Internet Service Provider serving Albertans as well clients globally with our newly introduced web hosting services. GETUS is a financially stable company with serving hundreds of clients in over 47 countries, your success for growth is our success.

To visit GETUS, please click here.

Web Hosting on GETUS is ideal for any person or business looking to broadcast their web site or project on the world wide web (www). GETUS Communications provides an easy to use panel which is an industry norm perfected known as "cPanel" and our experienced system administrators are available for whatever the need 24/7 - We'll even transfer* your contents from another host to us FREE of charge! All our servers are located in North Carolina, Lenoir in the Centrilogic Data Centre.

Freebies and Included Services:
- Choose any email you want at your domain! (ie. hello@mydomain.com)
- Grow with us! Select any plan and upgrade anytime on GETUS!
- No Contracts! You're not locked in with any agreements. #NoNonSense
- Available 24/7/365 to assist, from setting up email to website transfers. We're here to help!
- We offer Unlimited features! Add as many email, FTP, MySQL and others as you would like with us!
